page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: We are the third and fourth year boys and girls of{Wykeham C.E.}school and are very excited to be collecting information for the Domesday Project. Our school was built in{1856}by a famous Victorian architect,{William {Butterfield.}It has two classrooms and the school house is used for extra class space. There are 42 pupils from 4+-11 years and 2 full time teachers and 1 part-time. Our headteacher is called Mrs. Wilderspin and she has been here for 19 years. We come from several villages and most of us stay at school for lunch. There is a playing field at the back of the school and we love to get out there for games. Our villages are all situated in the {Vale of Pickering}which was formed by glaciers and left a large glacial lake which is now underground.
